entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cambridge Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:35 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -40.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cambridge Bay Airport 10:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -40.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -44.4°C
Wind: NE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Ice fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 36. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
